cards.description: Shows all available zones where you can create VM instances.
cards.whenToUse: When choosing a zone for new resources or checking zone availability.
scenarios: Zone selection: Finding zones near your users
Availability check: Seeing which zones are available
Cost planning: Comparing zones for pricing differences

cards.description: Creates a new virtual machine in the specified zone with default settings.
cards.whenToUse: When you need a new server or development machine in the cloud.
scenarios: New server: Spinning up a web server
Development: Creating a dev/test environment
Quick prototype: Getting a machine for experimentation

cards.task: List all VM instances in the project
cards.description: Shows all VM instances with their status, zone, and IP addresses.
cards.whenToUse: When checking what instances are running or finding IP addresses.
scenarios: Inventory: Reviewing all running instances
Cost audit: Finding instances that might need cleanup
IP lookup: Finding the IP address of an instance

cards.description: Opens an SSH connection to the specified VM instance.
cards.whenToUse: When you need to access a VM's command line.
scenarios: Administration: Running commands on your server
Debugging: Investigating issues on a VM
Deployment: Manually deploying or configuring software

cards.description: Shuts down a VM instance while preserving its disk and configuration.
cards.whenToUse: When you want to stop billing for compute time but keep the VM.
scenarios: Cost saving: Stopping dev machines overnight
Maintenance: Stopping before resizing or changing config
Pause work: Temporarily stopping an unused instance

cards.description: Boots up a previously stopped VM instance.
cards.whenToUse: When resuming work on a stopped instance.
scenarios: Resume work: Starting a dev machine in the morning
Scaling up: Bringing instances back online for traffic
Maintenance complete: Restarting after configuration changes

cards.description: Permanently deletes a VM instance and its boot disk.
cards.whenToUse: When you no longer need an instance and want to stop all charges.
scenarios: Cleanup: Removing temporary or test instances
Cost reduction: Deleting unused resources
Project end: Removing infrastructure after project completion

cards.task: Create a snapshot of a disk
cards.description: Creates a point-in-time backup of a persistent disk.
cards.whenToUse: Before making major changes or for regular backups.
scenarios: Backup: Creating a recovery point before updates
Clone: Preparing to create copies of a disk
Migration: Snapshotting before moving to a different zone

cards.task: Copy a file to a VM instance
cards.description: Securely copies files between your local machine and a VM instance.
cards.whenToUse: When transferring files to or from a VM.
scenarios: Deployment: Copying application files to a server
Backup: Downloading files from a VM locally
Configuration: Uploading config files to an instance
